snippet.title: Dungeons And Dining Tables - Gameplay Trailer | Catalyst Games
snippet.description:
Dungeons and Dining Tables is a Cosy-Adventure RPG created by Indie Games Studio: Catalyst Games! 

Our game takes inspiration from the cosy nature of home decorating with aesthetically pleasing furniture pieces and the fast-paced contrast of exciting 3rd person combat across procedural generated levels in a fantasy world made of megalithic furniture mountains and populated by kleptomaniac creatures out to ruin your day.

 ⚔   Delve Dungeons for rare Furniture items
🏡 Decorate your home to improve your stats
👻 Defeat Bosses to bring new NPCs to your township! 

🔗 Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2941630/Dungeons_and_Dining_Tables/
🤼 Join our Discord: https://dndt.link/discord
👕 Want to buy a T-shirt? https://dndt.link/merch
💡 Everything else: https://dndt.link

#gaming #indiegame #cozygaming
